extendedInfo.description: A collection of inspirational quotes on topics including success, life, leadership, love, motivation. Updated Daily with hundred of life quotes.Quotes about motivation, love, lovers, girls, boys, mother, father, happy, angry, sad, emotions, feelings, friendship, relationship, friend, relation, smile, people, sky, dream, life, nature, hate, pretty, beautiful, attitude, country, classic, music, art, dance, advice, breakup, dating and much moreFor Android Ice Cream Sandwich (ICS) and above phones Tablet PCs (Tabs) and Phones including Galaxy S3, Galaxy note 10.1
